name: bitclock-backend
description: A BitClock backend written in TypeScript.
author: Eric Slenk <lucid.machine@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: for d in build test; do if [ -d "$d" ]; then rm -r $d; fi; done
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:main && npm run build:module
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:lint test:unit
scripts.watch: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json --watch & jest --watch & wait
scripts.cov: npm run build cov:build && opn build/coverage/index.html
scripts.reset: git clean -dfx && git reset --hard && npm i

scripts-info.info: Display information about the package scripts
scripts-info.fix: Try to automatically fix any linting problems
scripts-info.test: Lint and unit test the project
scripts-info.watch: Watch and rebuild the project on save, then rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Rebuild, run tests, then create and open the coverage report
scripts-info.version: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag release
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.prepare-release: One-step: clean, build, test, and prep a release
